thread.title: ‘You Know Nothing!’ Jenelle Evans RIPS Leah Messer For Dissing Her Reunion Show Fight
thread.title_full: ‘You Know Nothing!’ Jenelle Evans RIPS Leah Messer For Dissing Her Reunion Show Fight

author: Teresa Roca
title: ‘You Know Nothing!’ Jenelle Evans RIPS Leah Messer For Dissing Her Reunion Show Fight
text:
Yes, please sign me up to receive The Daily Juice Privacy Policy send ‘You Know Nothing!’ Jenelle Evans RIPS Leah Messer For Dissing Her Reunion Show Fight The 'Teen Mom 2' star also takes aim at Chelsea Houska! Posted on Mar 21, 2017 @ 11:39AM 
Instead of the Teen Mom 2 stars fighting with their baby daddies on the season finale, they fought with each other! Jenelle Evans bashed co-stars Leah Messer and Chelsea Houska while filming for the reunion show. 
On the finale, Evans stormed off the reunion show set after filming her segment because MTV wouldn’t provide the then-pregnant star food . 
“I was sick because I had acid reflux/heartburn from not eating,” she tweeted. “No one cared because I asked for food for 3 hours and wasn’t allowed to leave. I was done filming my part of the reunion and was hungry for hours with a burning chest from heartburn.”
